title: Saints
cleaned_text: - many bodies of the saints which slept arose, [Matt. 27:52](/study/scriptures/nt/matt/27.52?lang=eng#p52) ( [Hel. 14:25](/study/scriptures/bofm/hel/14.25?lang=eng#p25); [3 Ne. 23:9-11](/study/scriptures/bofm/3-ne/23.9-11?lang=eng#p9)). - he hath done to thy saints, [Acts 9:13](/study/scriptures/nt/acts/9.13?lang=eng#p13). - to the saints which dwelt at Lydda, [Acts 9:32](/study/scriptures/nt/acts/9.32?lang=eng#p32). - when he had called the saints and widows, [Acts 9:41](/study/scriptures/nt/acts/9.41?lang=eng#p41). - beloved of God, called to be saints, [Rom. 1:7](/study/scriptures/nt/rom/1.7?lang=eng#p7). - he maketh intercession for the saints, [Rom. 8:27](/study/scriptures/nt/rom/8.27?lang=eng#p27). - Distributing to the necessity of saints, [Rom. 12:13](/study/scriptures/nt/rom/12.13?lang=eng#p13). - I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints, [Rom. 15:25](/study/scriptures/nt/rom/15.25?lang=eng#p25). - sanctified in Christ Jesus, called to be saints, [1 Cor. 1:2](/study/scriptures/nt/1-cor/1.2?lang=eng#p2). - saints shall judge the world, [1 Cor. 6:2](/study/scriptures/nt/1-cor/6.2?lang=eng#p2). - author ... of peace, as in all churches of the saints, [1 Cor. 14:33](/study/scriptures/nt/1-cor/14.33?lang=eng#p33). - saints which are in all Achaia, [2 Cor. 1:1](/study/scriptures/nt/2-cor/1.1?lang=eng#p1). - fellowship of the ministering to the saints, [2 Cor. 8:4](/study/scriptures/nt/2-cor/8.4?lang=eng#p4). - not only supplieth the want of the saints, [2 Cor. 9:12](/study/scriptures/nt/2-cor/9.12?lang=eng#p12). - to the saints which are at Ephesus, [Eph. 1:1](/study/scriptures/nt/eph/1.1?lang=eng#p1). - no more strangers ... but fellowcitizens with the saints, [Eph. 2:19](/study/scriptures/nt/eph/2.19?lang=eng#p19). - who am less than the least of all saints, [Eph. 3:8](/study/scriptures/nt/eph/3.8?lang=eng#p8). - For the perfecting of the saints, [Eph. 4:12](/study/scriptures/nt/eph/4.12?lang=eng#p12) ( [D&C 124:143](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/124.143?lang=eng#p143)). - fornication ... let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints, [Eph. 5:3](/study/scriptures/nt/eph/5.3?lang=eng#p3). - all perseverance and supplication for all saints, [Eph. 6:18](/study/scriptures/nt/eph/6.18?lang=eng#p18). - saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, [Philip. 1:1](/study/scriptures/nt/philip/1.1?lang=eng#p1). - To the saints and faithful brethren, [Col. 1:2](/study/scriptures/nt/col/1.2?lang=eng#p2). - coming of our Lord ... with all his saints, [1 Thes. 3:13](/study/scriptures/nt/1-thes/3.13?lang=eng#p13). - he shall come to be glorified in his saints, [2 Thes. 1:10](/study/scriptures/nt/2-thes/1.10?lang=eng#p10). - ye have ministered to the saints, [Heb. 6:10](/study/scriptures/nt/heb/6.10?lang=eng#p10). - Salute ... all the saints, [Heb. 13:24](/study/scriptures/nt/heb/13.24?lang=eng#p24). - contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints, [Jude 1:3](/study/scriptures/nt/jude/1.3?lang=eng#p3). - odours, which are the prayers of saints, [Rev. 5:8](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/5.8?lang=eng#p8). - offer it with the prayers of all saints, [Rev. 8:3](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/8.3?lang=eng#p3). - the patience and the faith of the saints, [Rev. 13:10](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/13.10?lang=eng#p10) ( [14:12](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/14.12?lang=eng#p12)). - thou King of saints, [Rev. 15:3](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/15.3?lang=eng#p3). - they have shed the blood of saints, [Rev. 16:6](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/16.6?lang=eng#p6). - woman drunken with the blood of the saints, [Rev. 17:6](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/17.6?lang=eng#p6). - in her was found the blood of prophets, and of saints, [Rev. 18:24](/study/scriptures/nt/rev/18.24?lang=eng#p24). - they ... compassed the
